path: PDF Library/30 Rock Studio Maintenance - 30 Rock Global Infrastructure/PPI/Win_Network_Activation.docx
text: Windows License Activation Department Involved: Production Application Engineering Author: Date: Enzo Sangiorgio 3/14/2022 Objective/Purpose: Activate Windows using the NBC License Server. Necessary Information: Windows 10 Pro Activation Key: W269N-WFGWX-YVC9B-4J6C9-T83GX NBC KMS License Servers (all use port 1688): Nbcukms.inbcu.com - (verified 12.25.23 with Rob S in News IT.) Cmd prompt Slmgr.vbs /skms nbcukms.inbcu.com will point your NUC machine to the NBC KMS server to be activated. 100.117.85.191 100.117.66.44 (OLD) 100.96.126.165 (OLD) Make sure the device is connected to the NBCU corp network and that you can ping the KMS servers. Example: 	 1: Install Windows or Change Activation Key 	Windows must be installed with, or the activation key changed to, the Windows 10 Pro Activation Key as shown above. If you are setting up a new installation, use it when prompted and proceed to the next step after install completes. If Windows is already installed with a different key, follow these steps: Right-click and open a Command Prompt as administrator. Use the slmgr.vbs /ipk command with the activation key to change it. Type slmgr.vbs /ipk W269N-WFGWX-YVC9B-4J6C9-T83GX and press enter. You will receive a confirmation pop-up. If this fails, try rebooting, then try changing the key through the Windows menu. https://www.windowscentral.com/how-change-product-key-windows-10 If all else fails, reinstall the correct Enterprise version of Windows. 	 2: Activate Windows Right-click and open a Command Prompt as administrator. Use the slmgr.vbs /skms command with the KMS Server IP address and port number, follow this format: slmgr.vbs /skms KMS-SERVER-IP:1688 For example: Type slmgr.vbs /skms 100.117.85.191:1688 into the command line and press Enter. You will receive a confirmation pop-up. Type slmgr.vbs /ato and press Enter. This will try to activate Windows using the key and license server you provided. If this fails, try rebooting, then try a different license server. If it does not activate, escalate to IT. To confirm, go to Settings > Activation Settings. It should say “Windows is activated using your organization’s activation service”
